name: BOMBA LINE
description:
**PLAYS BEST WITH A KEYBOARD. IT IS PLAYABLE ON MOBILE, BUT THE VIRTUAL GAMEPAD IS TRICKY TO PLAY WITH.**

Name: BOMBA LINE

Story: You are a bomb that is trying to start a BOMBA LINE (a conga line of bombs).

Goal: Your goal is to collect as many bombs as possible for your BOMBA LINE. The number of bombs is your score.

Obstacles: The head of the BOMBA LINE will explode every 10 seconds and be replaced with the next bomb in the BOMBA LINE. Avoid fire (though you are immune to fire for a moment after one of your bombs explode). Avoid the walls. Avoid your own BOMBA LINE! If your leader hits any of these obstacles or your leader explodes and your BOMBA LINE is empty, you lose.

Controls: Arrow keys.

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51, the theme of which was "Every 10 Seconds".

Thanks for playing!
